english.segment1: My soul proclaims Your greatness, Lord. Rejoicing in my Saviour. Your mercy belongs to those who fear Your Son. His blessings You have given them forever
english.segment2: And holy is His name, holy is His name
english.segment3: You alone have done great things. I can't boast of anything. Mighty one, and King of kings, Jesus. You alone have done great things. By Your living word in me. Mighty One, and King of kings, Jesus
english.segment4: My soul proclaims Your greatness, Lord. Rejoicing in my Saviour. Your mercy belongs to those who fear Your Son. His blessings You have given them forever
english.segment5: And holy is His name, holy is His name
english.segment6: You alone have done great things. I can't boast of anything. Mighty one, and King of kings, Jesus. You alone have done great things. By Your living word in me. Mighty One, and King of kings, Jesus
english.segment7: And it's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. It's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. And it's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. It's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud
english.segment8: And it's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. It's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. It's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. It's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out

english.segment10: And it's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. It's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. It's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out loud. It's Your name we're shouting out. Shouting out
